roleset.name: to buy in excessive amounts

example.name: Args 0 & 2
example.text: Instead members of the Saudi royal family must either overpay or overbuy from foreign companies in order for those companies to return a percentage of that money.
example.arg: members of the Saudi royal family
in order for those companies to return a percentage of that money.

roleset.note: OVERBUY-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire; comparison to buy. (from overbuy.01-v)
Most roles are probably rare with this verb. See "buy" for details on arg usage. (from overbuy.01-v)
